description: Single storey rear wrap around extension; rear roof extension, extending over existing rear outrigger; installation of three front rooflights
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s):
Site and Location Plan, Existing Plans Section & Elevations, Proposed Plans Section & Elevations.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).

| The proposed front roof lights shall not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured perpendicular from the external surface of the original roof.
Reason: So that the development complements the street sequence and achieves a high standard of amenity in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD 2013.
